monero.wallet

Class MoneroWalletDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • monero.wallet.MoneroWalletDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoneroWallet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoneroWalletRpc

    public abstract class MoneroWalletDefault
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoneroWallet
    Default implementation of a Monero Wallet.
